title: AI-Powered Learning: Responsible Use
image_desc: A stylized image of a student using a laptop with an AI interface displayed, surrounded by books and learning materials. The overall tone is positive and encouraging.
narration: Welcome!  Today, we'll explore the responsible use of AI in learning.  We'll look at both the benefits and potential pitfalls of using AI-powered tools like large language models.

title: The Power and Responsibility of AI
content:
Great potential for learning
Ethical use is crucial
Develop strong judgment
image_desc: An image depicting a balance scale, with "Potential Benefits" on one side and "Ethical Considerations" on the other, visually representing the need for balance in AI usage.
narration: Large language models offer incredible potential for learning, but this power comes with a responsibility to use them ethically.  We need to develop strong judgment to differentiate between responsible and irresponsible uses.

title: Critical Thinking: The Key Skill
content:
Maintain critical thinking
Don't blindly trust AI
Verify information
image_desc: A graphic depicting a brain with interconnected neurons, symbolizing critical thinking and problem-solving.
narration: It's vital to keep your critical thinking skills sharp. Don't blindly trust AI; always verify the information it provides.  The ability to think critically is more important than ever.

title: AI's Limitations
content:
**Column 1: Inaccuracies**
Inaccurate information
Inefficient calculations
"Hallucinations" (fabricating information)
**Column 2: Lack of Judgment**
No understanding of context
Cannot assess truthfulness
No emotional intelligence
image_desc: A split image showing a computer screen displaying incorrect calculations on one side and a confused expression on a person's face on the other side.
narration: Remember, AIs aren't always right. They can provide inaccurate information, perform calculations inefficiently, and even fabricate information, sometimes called "hallucinating."  Crucially, they lack judgment and context.

title: Effective AI Interaction: The "Genius in the Room" Model
content: (No additional content needed, caption in image)
image_desc: An illustration of a standing figure on the left holds a long list with the word "prompt" at the top. The words "I have questions" are above the figure's head. The long list trails down under a door in the center of the image, and the end of the long list continues to the other side of the door, where a crouching figure reads instructions. The words "I will give you words" are above the crouching figure's head.  The caption should read: "The 'genius in the room' mental model to help with prompt engineering".
narration: Think of the AI as a genius who knows a lot but needs clear instructions.  This "genius in the room" model helps you craft effective prompts.

title: Best Practices for Prompt Engineering
content:
Explain the problem clearly
Specify output structure (list, essay, etc.)
Define tone and style
Provide necessary context
image_desc: A person writing carefully on a piece of paper, symbolizing the careful crafting of prompts.
narration: To get the best results, explain your problem clearly, specify the desired output structure, define the tone and style, and provide any necessary context.  This process is called prompt engineering.

title: Academic Honesty: Avoiding Harmful Uses
content:
**Column 1: Harmful Uses**
Using AI to answer homework
Using AI to write essays without approval
**Column 2: Consequences**
Zero on assignments
Suspension from school
Loss of learning opportunity
image_desc: A split image showing a student looking stressed and guilty on one side, and a school principal looking disapproving on the other.
narration: Using AI to cheat on assignments is harmful and can have serious consequences.  It's crucial to maintain academic honesty and learn from the process.

title: Staying Sharp:  Verification is Key
content:
Always verify information
AI can sometimes double down on falsehoods
Critical thinking remains essential
image_desc: An image of a magnifying glass examining a computer screen, symbolizing the verification process.
narration: Even when using AI responsibly, always verify the information it provides.  AI can sometimes be wrong, and critical thinking remains essential.  Stay sharp! The world needs your critical thinking skills.
